level.heading: Jurisdiction.
level.text: There is jurisdiction to prosecute any person who participates in the commission of any offense described in this chapter if any act in furtherance of the offense occurs in the District of Columbia or where the effect of any act in furtherance of the offense occurs in the District of Columbia.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 14-194
level.text: For Law 14-194, see notes following ยง 22-3151.
